parameters.name: FuzzySearch
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable fuzzy search. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

parameters.name: MaxRecordsPerPage
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Enumerated valid values: 10, 30, and 50.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The resource group ID. For more information about resource groups, see related documentation.

parameters.name: TemplateName
parameters.description: The name of the IP whitelist template. If you specify this parameter when you perform a fuzzy search, you can call the DescribeWhitelistTemplate operation to query the name of the whitelist template during the fuzzy search.
